Class ArrayMethods

java.lang.Object
ArrayMethods
public class ArrayMethods extends Object
Array Method Class The class is used manage arrays Methods in this class are used to append new values to an existing array These methods create a new array, duplicate the values of the existing array and returns the new array with the added value on the last index of the new array
Version:
1.00, 27 July 2021
Author:
Chris Joubert

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    static BigDecimal[]
    addToBigDecimalArray​(BigDecimal[] passedArray, BigDecimal numToAdd)
    Add To BigDecimal Array Method
    The method returns a new array matching the values of and indexes of the passed array The passed BigDecimal is added to the last index in the new array
    static int[]
    addToIntArray​(int[] passedArray, int intToAdd)
    Add To Int Array Method
    The method returns a new array matching the values of and indexes of the passed array The passed intToAdd is added to the last index in the new array
    static String[]
    addToStringArray​(String[] passedArray, String stringToAdd)
    Add To String Array Method
    The method returns a new array matching the values of and indexes of the passed array The passed stringToAdd is added to the last index in the new array

      public ArrayMethods()

  • Method Details

    • addToIntArray

      public static int[] addToIntArray​(int[] passedArray, int intToAdd)
      Add To Int Array Method
      The method returns a new array matching the values of and indexes of the passed array The passed intToAdd is added to the last index in the new array
      Parameters:
      passedArray - Int Array containing all the values that need to be included in the new array
      intToAdd - Int to be appended to the new array
      Returns:
      Int Array containing all original values and the passed value appended on the last index
      Since:
      version 1.00

    • addToStringArray

      public static String[] addToStringArray​(String[] passedArray, String stringToAdd)
      Add To String Array Method
      The method returns a new array matching the values of and indexes of the passed array The passed stringToAdd is added to the last index in the new array
      Parameters:
      passedArray - String Array containing all the values that need to be included in the new array
      stringToAdd - String to be appended to the new array
      Returns:
      String Array containing all original values and the passed value appended on the last index
      Since:
      version 1.00

    • addToBigDecimalArray

      public static BigDecimal[] addToBigDecimalArray​(BigDecimal[] passedArray, BigDecimal numToAdd)
      Add To BigDecimal Array Method
      The method returns a new array matching the values of and indexes of the passed array The passed BigDecimal is added to the last index in the new array
      Parameters:
      passedArray - BigDecimal Array containing all the values that need to be included in the new array
      numToAdd - BigDecimal to be appended to the new array
      Returns:
      BigDecimal Array containing all original values and the passed value appended on the last index
      Since:
      version 1.00
